amendment.description: Amendment reauthorizes the Strategic Petroleum Reserve through 2003; authorizes the Secretary of Energy to buy oil from stripper wells; and authorizes the establishment of the Northeast Home Heating Oil Reserve.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 106-701 to replace the bill's provisions reauthorizing the Strategic Petroleum Reserve for one year with a new reauthorization for 3 years; authorize the Energy Department to buy oil from small or marginal wells when oil prices fall below $15 a barrel; and to authorize the establishment of a new regional home heating oil reserve in the Northeast.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherwood amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 393 - 33 (Roll no. 339).
